summary: The diff successfully implements both REQ-7 and REQ-8. A ContactSection component was added to the homepage with email, phone, address, and social media links using IPL-themed design. A WelcomeModal component was created that appears on first visit, collects name/email/phone, uses localStorage to prevent repeated displays, and includes a close button. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: Phone number contact method in ContactSection
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 specifies 'contact information such as email address and social media links' with acceptance criteria requiring 'at least an email address field'. While phone and physical address add value, they were not explicitly requested.
REQ-7 does not request a physical address. The acceptance criteria only require email and social media links to be displayed.
The file summary mentions 'business hours' which was not requested in REQ-7. The BuildRequest only asks for email and social media links.
